title: When to Say No!
itunes:title: When to Say No!
description:
In this episode, Kimberly Cobb talks about her first drag queen experience at the Essie influencer event in Austin, shares her top 5 reasons of when you should say "no," *cough cough, Season 3* and more!

 

Follow for weekly episodes of the "My Lips Aren't Sealed" podcast, where I discuss dating, fashion, entertainment, travel, pop culture, and more from my life! Thanks for listening!
